channel.title: Generosity on Infinite Walk
channel.description: Recent content in Generosity on Infinite Walk

item.title: The Future
item.description: Sometimes, I think life is just this, and nothing else. There is no certainty, there is no pre-determined rules. Life doesn’t come with a operating manual. And all five lives from Albert Camus says it all. Download this poem as image, text, or pdf.
